alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 13 at 10:35PM CDT until July 14 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 485, PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING, IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT FRIDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OKLAHOMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF OKLAHOMA BEAVER CIMARRON TEXAS IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 20 COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF TEXAS ARMSTRONG CARSON COLLINGSWORTH DALLAM DEAF SMITH DONLEY GRAY HANSFORD HARTLEY HEMPHILL HUTCHINSON LIPSCOMB MOORE OCHILTREE OLDHAM POTTER RANDALL ROBERTS SHERMAN WHEELER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMARILLO, BEAVER, BOISE CITY, BOOKER, BOOTLEG, BORGER, BOYS RANCH, BRISCOE, BUFFALO LAKE, BUSHLAND, CANADIAN, CANYON, CHANNING, CLARENDON, CLAUDE, CODMAN, CONLEN, DALHART, DAWN, DOZIER, DUMAS, FARNSWORTH, FOLLETT, FORGAN, FOUR WAY, GLAZIER, GOODNIGHT, GRUVER, GUYMON, HARTLEY, HEREFORD, HIGGINS, KEYES, KINGSMILL, LAKE MARVIN, LELA, LORA, LUTIE, MASTERSON, MIAMI, PAMPA, PANHANDLE, PANTEX, PERRYTON, ROMERO, SAMNORWOOD, SHAMROCK, SKELLYTOWN, SPEARMAN, STRATFORD, TWITTY, UMBARGER, VEGA, WAKA, WARE, WASHBURN, WAYSIDE, WELLINGTON, WHEELER, WHITE DEER, WILDORADO, AND WOLF CREEK PARK.
